category: news
title: "Students create app that lets users scan barcodes on packaging to see how items can be recycled"
excerpt: "A web-based app created by university students will allow users to scan the barcode of various items, ranging from shampoo bottles to drink packets, to show how they can be recycled and where the nearest recycling bins are located."
